config: graph_title Champs manquants ou mal remplis (en proportion)

_total.requete: SELECT 100 * count(*) / (SELECT count(*) FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1) as val FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1

date.requete: SELECT 100 * count(*) / (SELECT count(*) FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1) as val FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1 AND (date_observation = '' OR date_observation IS NULL or date_observation = '0000-00-00')

config.label: date vide
config.info: Obs ayant une date NULL ou '' ou '0000-00-00'

auteurnoninscrit.requete: SELECT 100 * count(*) / (SELECT count(*) FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1) as val FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1 AND (ce_utilisateur NOT REGEXP '^-?[0-9]+$')

config.label: auteur non inscrit
config.info: Obs ayant un auteur non inscrit

auteursansemail.requete: SELECT 100 * count(*) / (SELECT count(*) FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1) as val FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1 AND (ce_utilisateur NOT REGEXP '^-?[0-9]+$' AND ce_utilisateur NOT REGEXP '^.+@.+$')

config.label: auteur sans email
config.info: Obs ayant un auteur non inscrit et n'ayant pas fourni son adresse email

coord.requete: SELECT 100 * count(*) / (SELECT count(*) FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1) as val FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1 AND (latitude IS NULL OR latitude = '' OR longitude IS NULL OR longitude = '')

config.label: coordonnees vides
config.info: Obs ayant des coordonnees NULL ou ''

localite.requete: SELECT 100 * count(*) / (SELECT count(*) FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1) as val FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1 AND (latitude IS NULL OR latitude = '' OR latitude = 0 OR longitude IS NULL OR longitude = '' OR longitude = 0) AND (ce_zone_geo IS NULL OR ce_zone_geo = '') AND (zone_geo IS NULL OR zone_geo = '')

config.label: localite vide
config.info: Obs ayant des coordonnees NULL ou '', et une [ce_]zone_geo NULL ou ''

espece.requete: SELECT 100 * count(*) / (SELECT count(*) FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1) as val FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1 AND (nom_sel_nn IS NULL OR nom_sel_nn = '')

config.label: espece non liee
config.info: Obs ayant un nom_sel_nn NULL ou ''

referentiel.requete: SELECT 100 * count(*) / (SELECT count(*) FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1) as val FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1 AND (nom_referentiel IS NULL OR nom_referentiel = '' OR nom_referentiel REGEXP '^autre.*$')

config.label: referentiel vide
config.info: Obs ayant un nom_referentiel NULL, '' ou 'autre*'

datesinversees.requete: SELECT count(*) as val FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1 AND date_transmission < date_observation

_paysselonref.requete: SELECT count(*) as val FROM cel_obs WHERE transmission = 1 AND

config.label: pays selon ref
